document.full_text: the new owner of a building set to become an islamic community center near the world trade center site is suing the previous tenant, the burlington coat factory, for eliminating billboards that could be cash cows.
document.title: n.y. islamic center site owner sues burlington coat factory
lines_and_colors: the new owner of a building set to become an islamic community center near the world trade center site is suing the previous tenant, the burlington coat factory, for eliminating billboards that could be cash cows.
